Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides notifications for E-ZPass transactions
Summary: Provides notifications for E-ZPass transactions that notifies the holder of an E-ZPass that he or she has passed through a toll plaza operated by the New York state thruway authority and a transaction has posted to such holder's account for his or her electronic toll collection device.
LawCode: Add ยง378-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing notifications for E-ZPass transactions
